text: Behold, I am with thee, and will keep thee in all places whither thou goest...
The LORD shall fight for you, and ye shall hold your peace.
Be strong and of a good courage, fear not, nor be afraid of them...
Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed...
Whither thou goest, I will go; and where thou lodgest, I will lodge...
For the LORD will not forsake his people for his great name's sake...
The LORD is with you while ye be with him; and if ye seek him, he will be found of you...
...for the joy of the LORD is your strength.
The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the LORD is the strength of my life...
The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.
Delight thyself also in the LORD; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
Be still, and know that I am God...
Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee...
He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits.
The LORD is my strength and song, and is become my salvation.
Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding.
In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
But they that wait upon the LORD shall renew their strength...
Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God...
When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee...
For the mountains shall depart, and the hills be removed; but my kindness shall not depart from thee...
For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, saith the LORD, thoughts of peace, and not of evil...
I have loved thee with an everlasting love: therefore with lovingkindness have I drawn thee.
It is of the LORD's mercies that we are not consumed... they are new every morning.
...seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.
Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
...lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world.
With men it is impossible, but not with God: for with God all things are possible.
For with God nothing shall be impossible.
For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son...
I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger...
I am the light of the world: he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness...
I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly.
Let not your heart be troubled: ye believe in God, believe also in me.
I am the way, the truth, and the life...
Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you...
I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him...
But ye shall receive power, after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you...
But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God...
...neither height, nor depth, nor any other creature, shall be able to separate us from the love of God.
If thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus, and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him... thou shalt be saved.
There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man... God will also make a way to escape.
...the God of all comfort; Who comforteth us in all our tribulation...
I am crucified with Christ: nevertheless I live; yet not I, but Christ liveth in me...
For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves...
Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think...
Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication... the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
And let the peace of God rule in your hearts...
Rejoice evermore. Pray without ceasing. In every thing give thanks...
For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need.
Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God... and it shall be given him.
Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins...
Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
And God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes... and there shall be no more death, neither sorrow, nor crying...
Commit thy way unto the LORD; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.
Be still, and know that I am God...
For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.
Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
Commit thy works unto the LORD, and thy thoughts shall be established.
Thou wilt keep him in perfect peace, whose mind is stayed on thee: because he trusteth in thee.
He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.
Fear not: for I have redeemed thee, I have called thee by thy name; thou art mine.
So shall my word be that goeth forth out of my mouth... it shall not return unto me void.
Ah Lord GOD! behold, thou hast made the heaven and the earth by thy great power...
I will look unto the LORD; I will wait for the God of my salvation...
The LORD is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him.
Yet now be strong, O Zerubbabel, saith the LORD; and be strong, O Joshua...
Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, saith the LORD of hosts.
For I am the LORD, I change not; therefore ye sons of Jacob are not consumed.
Blessed are the poor in spirit: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.
Ye are the light of the world...
Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find...
Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me... and ye shall find rest unto your souls.
If thou canst believe, all things are possible to him that believeth.
Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father's good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger...
I am the resurrection, and the life: he that believeth in me, though he were dead, yet shall he live.
...be baptized... and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost.
Therefore being justified by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ.
For the wages of sin is death; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
If any man be in Christ, he is a new creature...
The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace...
In whom we have redemption through his blood, the forgiveness of sins...
Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ.
Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness, and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son.
...to serve the living and true God; And to wait for his Son from heaven...
I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life...
...begotten again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead.
And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory...
Behold, I stand at the door, and knock: if any man hear my voice, and open the door, I will come in to him...
I have set the LORD always before me...
The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer...
Weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
Rest in the LORD, and wait patiently for him...
Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee...
My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.
I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge and my fortress...
The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
The name of the LORD is a strong tower: the righteous runneth into it, and is safe.
Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust, and not be afraid...
This is the way, walk ye in it...
For I the LORD thy God will hold thy right hand, saying unto thee, Fear not...
Look unto me, and be ye saved, all the ends of the earth...
Blessed is the man that trusteth in the LORD, and whose hope the LORD is.
The LORD is my portion, saith my soul; therefore will I hope in him.
A new heart also will I give you, and a new spirit will I put within you...
And they that be wise shall shine as the brightness of the firmament...
Then shall we know, if we follow on to know the LORD...
And I will restore to you the years that the locust hath eaten...
But let judgment run down as waters, and righteousness as a mighty stream.
But upon mount Zion shall be deliverance, and there shall be holiness...
He hath shewed thee, O man, what is good; and what doth the LORD require of thee...
The LORD is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble...
The LORD God is my strength, and he will make my feet like hinds' feet...
The LORD thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save... he will rejoice over thee with joy.
...be strong, O Zerubbabel, saith the LORD; and be strong, O Joshua...
For I, saith the LORD, will be unto her a wall of fire round about...
But unto you that fear my name shall the Sun of righteousness arise with healing in his wings.
Take therefore no thought for the morrow... sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof.
Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them, I will liken him unto a wise man...
Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing?... fear ye not therefore... ye are of more value than many sparrows.
And all things, whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer, believing, ye shall receive.
Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them...
The things which are impossible with men are possible with God.
In my Father's house are many mansions... I will come again, and receive you unto myself...
For in him we live, and move, and have our being...
Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer;
Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing...
God is faithful, by whom ye were called unto the fellowship of his Son Jesus Christ our Lord.
But as it is written, Eye hath not seen, nor ear heard...
For which cause we faint not; but though our outward man perish...
And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another...
For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure.
And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
Wherefore comfort yourselves together, and edify one another...
But the Lord is faithful, who shall stablish you, and keep you from evil.
Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life...
...the Lord stood with me, and strengthened me; that by me the preaching might be fully known...
Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us...
That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ.
Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul, both sure and steadfast, and which entereth into that within the veil;
Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering; (for he is faithful that promised;)
The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much.
For the eyes of the LORD are over the righteous, and his ears are open unto their prayers...
...he hath given unto us exceeding great and precious promises; that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature...
And this is the promise that he hath promised us, even eternal life.
Behold, what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us, that we should be called the sons of God...
And the Spirit and the bride say, Come. And let him that heareth say, Come...
Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly... and he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water...
And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee...
Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil...
Our soul waiteth for the LORD: he is our help and our shield.
The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way.
God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.
He only is my rock and my salvation; he is my defence; I shall not be moved.
For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him.
I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help. My help cometh from the LORD...
Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.
Every word of God is pure: he is a shield unto them that put their trust in him.
He hath made every thing beautiful in his time...
He brought me to the banqueting house, and his banner over me was love.
O LORD, be gracious unto us; we have waited for thee: be thou their arm every morning, our salvation in the time of trouble.
Behold, I have graven thee upon the palms of my hands...
Call unto me, and I will answer thee, and shew thee great and mighty things...
For the Lord will not cast off for ever:
I will give them an heart to know me, that I am the LORD...
...the God of heaven... revealeth the deep and secret things...
I will betroth thee unto me for ever...
And it shall come to pass afterward, that I will pour out my spirit upon all flesh...
Seek good, and not evil; that ye may live...
...deliverers shall go up on mount Zion to judge the mount of Esau...
And many nations shall come, and say, Come, and let us go up to the mountain of the LORD...
Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.
For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
But Jesus beheld them, and said unto them, With men this is impossible; but with God all things are possible.
And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart...
Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down, and shaken together...
He must increase, but I must decrease.
All that the Father giveth me shall come to me...
Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ, and thou shalt be saved, and thy house.
There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus...
If the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you... shall quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you.
And now abideth faith, hope, charity, these three; but the greatest of these is charity.
My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness.
Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free...
That he would grant you, according to the riches of his glory, to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man;
I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus.
Put on therefore, as the elect of God, bowels of mercies, kindness, humbleness of mind...
For this is the will of God, even your sanctification...
Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us... comfort your hearts, and stablish you in every good word and work.
Let no man despise thy youth; but be thou an example of the believers...
All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine...
For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men.
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
For the word of God is quick, and powerful, and sharper than any twoedged sword...
But without faith it is impossible to please him...
...looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith...
My brethren, count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations;
Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above...
...who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree... that we should live unto righteousness...
As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same to one another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.
The LORD is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward...
He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.
And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us.
Fear not; I am the first and the last: I am he that liveth, and was dead; and, behold, I am alive for evermore...
Wait on the LORD: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart...
I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge.
What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.
Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation.
Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.
The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself.
There are many devices in a man's heart; nevertheless the counsel of the LORD, that shall stand.
The grass withereth, the flower fadeth: but the word of our God shall stand for ever.
Remember ye not the former things... behold, I will do a new thing...
No weapon that is formed against thee shall prosper...
Before I formed thee in the belly I knew thee...
Heal me, O LORD, and I shall be healed; save me, and I shall be saved...
Thou drewest near in the day that I called upon thee...
I will seek that which was lost...
He delivereth and rescueth...
I drew them with cords of a man, with bands of love...
And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the LORD shall be delivered...
In that day will I raise up the tabernacle of David that is fallen...
According to your faith be it unto you.
For where two or three are gathered together in my name, there am I in the midst of them.
But Jesus said, Suffer little children, and forbid them not...
...Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart...
For what shall it profit a man, if he shall gain the whole world, and lose his own soul?
Behold, I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions...
...that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations...
He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.
Be it known unto you therefore... through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins...
For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God; Being justified freely by his grace...
For whether we live, we live unto the Lord; and whether we die, we die unto the Lord...
...but ye are washed, but ye are sanctified...
For he hath made him to be sin for us, who knew no sin... that we might be made the righteousness of God in him.
Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law, being made a curse for us...
For we are his workmanship, created in Christ Jesus unto good works...
For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.
As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk ye in him...
Faithful is he that calleth you, who also will do it.
Wherefore also we pray always for you, that our God would count you worthy...
This is a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners.
If we believe not, yet he abideth faithful: he cannot deny himself.
In hope of eternal life, which God, that cannot lie, promised before the world began;
That the communication of thy faith may become effectual...
For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted, he is able to succour them that are tempted.
...I will put my laws into their mind, and write them in their hearts...
...unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation.
Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you.
Whom having not seen, ye love; in whom, though now ye see him not, yet believing...
Wherefore the rather, brethren, give diligence to make your calling and election sure...
The blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin.
Beloved, if our heart condemn us not, then have we confidence toward God...
Now unto him that is able to keep you from falling...
Behold, the tabernacle of God is with men, and he will dwell with them...
He which testifieth these things saith, Surely I come quickly. Amen. Even so, come, Lord Jesus.
